short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official Google Chrome extension to tap on Tapious

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tap the things you find on the web!

Save creative ideas from around the web with the official Tapious browser button for Chrome.

Just click the Tapious button next time you find something interesting that you want to save for later.
